messages.title: Fighting for Bermondsey & Old Southwark
messages.content: Neil's top priorities for Bermondsey & Old Southwark.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll keep opposing Tory cuts to education.
I'll keep fighting for genuinely affordable homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Standing our ground on political and economic stability
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will continue to stay strong on political and economic stability.

issues.brexitEurope: I'll keep opposing a hard Tory Brexit.
issues.economy: I will continue to stay strong on political and economic stability.
issues.education: I'll keep opposing Tory cuts to education.

housing.content: I'll keep fighting for genuinely affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'll fight tooth & nail to improve the lives of the people in Bermondsey & Old Southwark.

politicalExperience.achievements: Securing millions in additional funds for our local schools, keeping St Thomas' A&E open, helping thousands of individual residents and beating No Deal Brexit for British jobs.

endorsements.endorser: Rt Hon. Harriet Harman QC MP

endorsements.endorsement: A hardworking MP for our area.

images.caption: Neil Coyle MP fighting for Bermondsey & Old Southwark.
